summary: Treat every unexpected message like a stranger at your front door: verify before you open.

headline: Salesforce Has to Prove Software’s Staying Power in AI Age
summary: Salesforce is under a growing cloud of existential worry about the future of software businesses in the age of AI. Investors want proof that growth will pick back up.

headline: Salesforce: A Good Long-Term Buy For Growth Investors
summary: Salesforce's agentic AI adoption is growing, and the company trades at a reasonable valuation. Find out why CRM stock is a Buy.

headline: AI Seen as Multi-Year Tailwind for Salesforce (CRM), Says Goldman Sachs
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the AI Stocks Investors Are Watching Closely. On September 4, Goldman Sachs analyst Kash Rangan reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $385.00 price target. Salesforce’s Q2 results modestly topped expectations, though Q3 revenue guidance midpoint came in below consensus, pressuring shares. Goldman Sachs highlighted how artificial intelligence […]
